title: Cost of Covid-19 Testing Exceeds $100 for Some Families as Omicron Surges
sub_head: Facing long lines at free sites, some people turn to companies that sell lab tests for more than $200, or pay $20 or more for at-home tests
body:
Some families say they are spending hundreds of dollars on Covid-19 testing during the surge in cases across the country, as efforts by the Biden administration and local officials to distribute free tests lag behind the Omicron variantâ€™s rapid spread.
Facing hourslong lines at free testing sites, some people have turned to companies that sell more-convenient laboratory testing options, in some cases at prices of more than $200. And until the Biden administration begins making free Covid-19 testing more widely available, some people say they will continue to pay $20 or more for over-the-counter, at-home tests.
